questions.question: 1. What is the number of flip flops required to implement a cicruit that detects a sequence of 3 or more 1s(ones)?

explanations.b: In the state diagram for the sequence of 3 there will be 4 states 0 (that is 0 consecutive 1s), 1 (that is 1 consecutive 1s), 2 (that is 2 consecutive 1s) and 3 (that is 3 consecutive 1s). So for 4 states there will be 2 flip flops required to implement the circuit.
